page.title: 08Recreation in Milton Ernest
page.content: The most popular leisure activities of people in{Milton Ernest and Radwell are gardening, reading, needlecraft and other forms of craftwork. These occupy 55% of the community. Other pursuits include travel, cruising on ocean liners, caravanning, camping, local affairs and countryside, dancing campanology, animal care, ornithology, genealogy, history, languages, discussion groups, computer games, watching television, photography, aviation, card and board games, entertaining, voluntary hospital work, Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts, church activities and bible_study groups, amateur dramatics and theatre visits, youth club, crosswords, philately and wine_tasting.
